Action required NO further action *OBSERVE if only 1 feature IMMEDIATE MANAGEMENT (see flowcharts- stop

persists 
*A suspicious CTG is not an indication of fetal hypoxia. Many CTGs fall into the suspicious category, and in most cases,
there is nothing wrong with the fetus. However, it is an indication for ongoing CTG monitoring to see if the CTG becomes
